full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 745 Filed 08/10/22 Page 232 of 264 643 LC1VMAX7 Matt - direct 1 A. Yes. 2 Q. What did she tell you about that? 3 A. Well, I was the one that asked her, based on after finding out who it was, I asked her if she was doing that for the 4 money. 5 6 Q. What did she tell you she was doing for the money? 7 A. She said it wasn't -- 8 THE COURT: Just a minute. Just a minute. 9 Sustained. 10 Q. In your conversations with Jane about Jeffrey Epstein, did there come a time when she told you that she had to do things 11 she didn't want to do? 12 13 A. Yes. 14 Q. What did she tell you about that? 15 A. She never went into detail; she just said it wasn't free. 16 Q. Did she ever use any particular words to describe the 17 things that she had to do with Jeffrey Epstein? 18 A. Nothing specific. No specific words. 19 Q. In your conversations with her, did she ever use the word 20 "massage"? 21 MS. STERNHEIM: Objection. Leading. 22 THE COURT: Overruled. 23 I'll allow it. You may answer. 24 A. Yes. 25 Q. What did she tell you about that? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012252
